title: Guidance UK Airspace Design Support Fund

sections.heading: Summary
sections.content:
Guidance: UK Airspace Design Support Fund rules and eligibility criteria. Who can apply to the UK Airspace Design Support Fund and fund administration rules.

Official Statistics: Renewable Transport Fuel Obligation (RTFO) statistics 2025: Second provisional release. Supply of renewable fuels for January to December 2025.

Sustainable Aviation Fuel (SAF) Mandate statistics: data tables. Data on the supply of sustainable aviation fuel (SAF), as required under the Sustainable Aviation Fuel (SAF) Mandate.

sections.heading: Context
sections.content: These developments affect aviation connectivity, airspace management, and surface access to airports. Readers interested in Scottish aviation heritage may find parallels in the industrial and operational history documented in our research volumes.
